org.opensaml.saml2.metadata.provider
Interface ObservableMetadataProvider.Observer

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractObservableMetadataProvider.DescriptorIndexClearingObserver, ChainingMetadataProvider.ContainedProviderObserver, MetadataCredentialResolver.MetadataProviderObserver
Enclosing interface:
ObservableMetadataProvider
public static interface ObservableMetadataProvider.Observer

An observer of metadata provider changes. NOTE: The metadata provider that has changed is passed in to the onEvent(MetadataProvider) method. Observers should NOT keep a reference to this provider as this may prevent proper garbage collection.

Method Summary
 void onEvent(MetadataProvider provider)
          Called when a provider signals an event has occured.
 

Method Detail

onEvent

void onEvent(MetadataProvider provider)
Called when a provider signals an event has occured.

Parameters:
provider - the provider being observed
